headline: Super Micro (SMCI) Targets One-Third Market Share, Faces Near-term Headwinds
summary: Super Micro Computer Inc. (NASDAQ:SMCI) is one of the best data center stocks to buy now. On August 11, the company presented at the KeyBanc Capital Markets Technology Leadership Forum, where Michael Stager, SVP of Corporate Development, discussed SuperMicro’s market position and growth targets. Stager highlighted that the company has expanded its share from 3.5% in […]
